A very modern optical store that carries a good variety of well known brands and the latest designs. Service is excellent. They always dispense with good advice and is knowledgeable with their products and no hard selling. Their prices are competitive.
Just got my spectacle from this shop today. Lyon is very patient and friendly. Mysha is kind too. Thank you guys.
